content.rendered:
ESG

Scroll Down
Services
Our Responsibility

At Alvarium, we are extremely proud of our culture, which is one of collaboration and connection. We believe that it’s our responsibility to leverage our global network of offices and partnerships, the skills of our employees and the influence and resources of our clients, so that we can collectively have a lasting and positive impact on our communities and the environment. We know that our aims are aligned with those of the family offices and institutions we serve, for whom wealth is not measured purely in terms of financial returns but in the long-term, intergenerational preservation of quality of life and improvements to environmental and social conditions for all.

ESG Responsible Investment

  • As long-term stewards of client capital and a un pri signatory, we believe that preservation and growth in capital are aligned with being a responsible investor, which we define as the incorporation of sustainable investment criteria in our investment decision making process.
  • Our process includes a rigorous evaluation of environmental, social and governance (ESG) practices of the managers we invest in and providing our clients with options to invest in sustainable and impact strategies. We believe these sustainability themes will come to represent some of the leading secular growth opportunities, driving strong returns.
  • Alvarium partners and shareholders invest side by side with our clients and we believe that we all have a role to play in positively influencing change by directing capital to responsible companies and investments.
  • We demonstrate our commitment to leadership in responsible investing by reporting to clients on their ESG, sustainable and impact exposures.

Alvarium Impact

Alvarium’s Co-investment teams are committed to sourcing and executing private and public market co-investment opportunities with a defined social or environmental impact. For example, Alvarium Social Housing Advisors Limited acts as investment advisor to a property authorised investment fund providing shelter for the homeless. In excess of £500m has been raised from long-term investors. The year 2020 also saw the launch of Home REIT PLC on the London Stock Exchange, which invests in homeless accommodation assets. Alvarium raised more than £240m in the IPO and acts as advisor.

Bees have been around for 130 million years. The first flowers emerged around the same time. Bees and flowers have evolved together, each becoming more diverse and sophisticated over the millennia. At some point, bees changed from being solitary creatures into social ones, living together. Honeybees went one step further and developed colony life, sharing their homes and duties. They live in well-organised apiaries, built in nests or man-made hives (alvaria) that protect them from wind and rain. These colonies are large and complex examples of cooperation and collaboration, with up to 100,000 bees working together as if they were one. Their roles within the community and their responsibilities to the environment in which they live and work are critical to this cohabitation. We, too, live in complex societies and, like bees, must depend on one another to protect our environment.

Our Culture

At Alvarium, a representative global committee oversees our approach to environmental, social and governance issues as a firm. We are determined to reflect the high standards expected of the managers in our own practices and seek to do so by improving our own working environment, positively impacting the communities in which we work, reducing our environmental footprint and, as a heavily regulated business, maintaining good governance practices. We encourage all employees to help in these efforts by including consideration of ESG aspects in our review process and compensation models. As a global business with offices across three continents, we are committed to building a workforce and leadership team that reflects the diversity of our client base. We believe in equality of opportunity because differing perspectives enrich both our own working environment and the quality of service we provide to our clients.
